Title: Into the Mild
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Kelvin Yu
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Plot: Bob realizes his dream of being an outdoorsman when the wilderness equipment store has a going out of business sale; Linda and the kids spend the night watching Aunt Gayle rehearse for her one-woman show.
